title: Corporate Worship
description: Our corporate worship gathering takes place every Sunday at 10:30am. This time is special because it is the only time during the week that our whole congregation is gathered together under one roof. It is a time devoted to the worship of Christ through the singing of traditional and modern hymns and spiritual songs. We gain courage and equipping to live out our faith as we hear the Word of God preached. We also give special attention to prayer each week, and we observe the Lord's Supper on the first Sunday of each month.

title: Small Groups
description: Our Sunday School groups normally meet at 9:15am on Sunday mornings. This is a time of in-depth Bible study centered around personal growth and application. We have groups for all ages and walks of life.

title: Glory Bound
description: Glory Bound is our Wednesday night gathering for students, children, and parents. It is a family oriented ministry so parents are encouraged to attend and participate with their children. From 6:30pm - 7:30pm, students 7th-12th grade meet for Gospel-centered Bible teaching and worship through music. During this time boys and girls K-6th grade meet for Glory Bound Kids, where they enjoy a Bible lesson, snacks, and games.
